jitter_percentage.descp: Jitter (local), a measure of frequency variation in percentage.

jitter_absolute.descp: Absolute jitter, a measure of frequency variation in seconds.

relative_average_perturbation.descp: Relative Average Perturbation, a measure of short-term frequency variation.

five_point_period_perturbation_quotient.descp: Five-point Period Perturbation Quotient, a measure of pitch variation.

difference_of_difference_of_periods.descp: Average absolute difference of differences between cycles, derived from RAP.

shimmer_percentage.descp: Shimmer (local), a measure of amplitude variation.

shimmer_decibels.descp: Shimmer in decibels, a logarithmic measure of amplitude variation.

three_point_amplitude_perturbation_quoti.descp: Three-point Amplitude Perturbation Quotient, a measure of amplitude variation.

five_point_amplitude_perturbation_quotie.descp: Five-point Amplitude Perturbation Quotient, a measure of amplitude variation.

amplitude_perturbation_quotient.descp: Amplitude Perturbation Quotient, a measure of overall amplitude variation.

difference_of_difference_of_amplitudes.descp: Average absolute difference between consecutive differences in amplitude.

noise_to_harmonics_ratio.descp: Noise-to-Harmonics Ratio, a measure of voice quality.

harmonics_to_noise_ratio.descp: Harmonics-to-Noise Ratio, a measure of voice quality.

recurrence_period_density_entropy.descp: Recurrence Period Density Entropy, a nonlinear dynamical complexity measure.

detrended_fluctuation_analysis.descp: Detrended Fluctuation Analysis, a measure of fractal scaling properties.

pitch_period_entropy.descp: Pitch Period Entropy, a measure of voice disorder.
